extensions: Color theme can be chosen in settings screen. This will change the color of revealed squares.
In play screen, when mouse hovers over square, its border lights up in the color theme chosen in settings screen.
Timer is shown on play screen.
Number of bombs that are on the board is shown on play screen. Placing a flag lowers the number and removing the flag brings it back up.
Custom mine probability can be selected in settings screen.
After losing, all mines are shown and the last uncovered square is highlighted red (which contained a mine)
